🚀 A. Copy master styles and components between files and quickly swap their instances


1. Find and swap styles and instances between masters with the same name


This feature allows you to copy master styles and components between files, change desired properties, and quickly swap their instances between copies.


☝️Compare to Figma swap library with the DSO you can pick and choose specific master styles and components to swap. You can also apply styles and components swap not only to the entire file, but also to a page or a selection.


How it works:

a) Select master styles or components and Mark them as Targets in the library file. You choose which masters will be used to find and swap instances.


b) Apply Relink in the design file. DSO looks for any matching styles or instances in the whole file, page or selection (optionally). Matching is based on the full swap or master name.


☝️ Style names are compared based on the full path along with the folder names e.g. "primary/opacity/200"

☝️ Variant names are compared based on the full name with properties e.g. "Button, typy=primary, state=hover"


Use to:

→ Move master components from the design file to the library file

→ Move master styles from the library file to an external styles file

→ Link all instances and styles back to the library after importing library and design files from the Sketch

→ Create a duplicate version of the design system and selective swap instances to the new copy

→ Improve library with new components and styles versions and selective switch between them


2. Copy styles between files


How it works:

a) Select styles and click Export in the file A

b) Click Import" file B


☝️All font used in styles need to detected by Figma

☝️Color styles with filled image are not supported yet


Use to:

→ Copy and inject styles into existing design system file.

→ Combine multiple styles files into a single one (eg. text styles and color styles together)


► Copy masters between files


🚀 B. Manage path names such as “toolbar/nav/back” like folders for components and styles


Features:

1) Rename group

2) Group / Ungroup

3) Move to (drag and drop)

4) Duplicate component and styles in bulk


Use to:

→ Reorganize and clean up an old and huge library with multiple names like "icons/small/actions/group"

→ Quickly duplicate multiple styles when only a few parameters need to be changed.

→ Organize styles with more options than Figma


🗒 DSO folder-like styles were developed before Figma released this feature and are implemented a little more conveniently.


► Manage names with /'s like folders


DETAILS


→ Works for local and external libraries

→ Context menu 

→ Shortcuts

→ All style types support

→ Variants support


SHORTCUTS


→ Multiple selection: Cmd/Ctrl + Item click

→ Select range: Shift + Item click

→ Select all: Cmd/Ctrl + A

→ Rename: R

→ Group/Ungroup: G/U

find more in context menu
